getLineNumber().Description: The line number this locator is pointing to, or -1 if there is no column number available.

getByteOffset().Description: The byte offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 if there is no byte offset available.

getColumnNumber().Description: The column number this locator is pointing to, or -1 if there is no column number available.

getUtf16Offset().Description: The UTF-16, as defined in [Unicode] and Amendment 1 of [ISO/IEC 10646], offset into the input source this locator is pointing to or -1 if there is no UTF-16 offset available.

getUri().Description: The URI this locator is pointing to, or null if no URI is available.

getRelatedNode().Description: The node this locator is pointing to, or null if no node is available.

ClassDesc: DOMLocator is an interface that describes a location (e.g. where an error occurred). See also the
